ygData.subject: Re: Leveling
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh yeah. Remember how important it was to learn about pullers or teaching nukers to time nukes? Grin. I STILL do the stackable loot stuff with lower
ygData.messageBody:
Oh yeah. Remember how important it was to learn
about pullers or teaching nukers to time nukes? Grin.
<br><br>I STILL do the stackable loot stuff with lower
level characters. LOL<br><br>Remember when a Backpack
in every slot in the bank seemed impossible? Now I'm
pondering spending all my plat on tailored backpacks for
every slot that has a backpack on my Druid.
LOL<br><br>At level 5, when I started over again in 2000... my
experience caused people to gasp over the fact that I could
CR so well for newbies on Orc Hill. LOL. I still
remember thinking-- poor people. I had many a CR where
people kept saying, "no not that body. That's the wrong
one."<br><br>I remember one newbie I pulled 4 bodies for before
we got the one with all the equipment. I still to
this day can't be sure there weren't more<br>lying
around. Grin.<br><br>And to think I was able to do it b/c
I had one very good piece of knowledge. Druid Camo
spell. At level five, knowing it's importance... it was
like the third spell I bought.<br><br>shooman
out<br><br>PS.. man. You know we could go on like this forever.
Sigh. Ahh the memories.
